# Idir Ouhab Meskine - AI & Automation Expert

## About
Idir Ouhab Meskine is a Senior Solutions Engineer at n8n, specializing in workflow automation, AI integration, and technical infrastructure. With a background at GitLab and Platzi, Idir combines enterprise DevOps expertise with educational content creation.

## Expertise
- n8n workflow automation and AI agent orchestration
- GitLab CI/CD and DevOps infrastructure
- Technical AI-Ops and cloud-native architectures
- Solution architecture for automation systems
- Technical speaking and education
- AI integration and LLM implementation
- Low-code/no-code automation platforms

## Professional Background
- **Current Role**: Senior Solutions Engineer at n8n (workflow automation platform)
- **Previous Experience**: GitLab (DevOps and CI/CD infrastructure)
- **Education Platform**: Official course instructor at Platzi
- **Speaking**: Regular speaker at tech conferences on AI, automation, and DevOps topics

## Podcast: Prompt&Play
A Spanish-language podcast exploring AI prompts, automation workflows, and the future of work. Available on Spotify and major podcast platforms.

**Topics Covered:**
- AI prompt engineering
- Workflow automation best practices
- n8n tips and techniques
- Future of work and technology trends
- AI agent development

## Services

### 1. Team Enablement
Custom workflow implementation, best practices for scaling, and ongoing architecture guidance. Helping teams cut manual work by 70%+ using automation and AI agents.

### 2. Training & Workshops
Hands-on training sessions on automation, AI, and n8n tailored to team needs. Practical workshops covering:
- Workflow automation fundamentals
- AI integration strategies
- n8n implementation
- Best practices for production systems

### 3. Speaking & Keynotes
Technical talks on AI integration, LLMs, and workflow automation for conferences and events. Available for:
- Technical conferences
- Corporate events
- Workshops and seminars
- Webinars and online events

### 4. Technical AI-Ops & Infrastructure
Building scalable automation infrastructure with GitLab CI/CD, deploying AI agents, and managing complex workflow systems in production environments. Expertise from enterprise DevOps to cloud-native architectures.

## Courses
Official n8n Course Instructor at Platzi, teaching thousands of students about workflow automation and AI integration.

**Course Topics:**
- n8n fundamentals and advanced techniques
- AI agent development
- Workflow automation patterns
- Integration strategies
- Production deployment
